name: Dawn of The Moon
description:
Dawn of The Moon will include fast-action combat and various puzzles that the player has to endure. The player has to obtain 3 various artefacts patrolled with its guardian, these artefacts are the keys that will hold the power to break the curse of Luntian, and set him free from the endless nightmare that he witnesses. 

You, the player, will be Luntian and he is cursed with witnessing the visions of the past, and the only way to cure them is through the artefacts that he sees through her visions, however the only way to enter these dungeons is for your soul to venture, don’t worry as the sprites will keep your soul intact before you’re every truly in danger, and return you to your body, however anything that you’ve had within the dungeon you will lose.
